summary: Removes the effects of gravity from arrows + Makes them go faster
descriptionHtml:
Removes the effects of gravity from arrows + Makes them go faster

I made this mod impressed by

No Gravity Arrows by Graxster
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/686

As No Gravity Arrows FAST by Graxster, I set all the speed of Arrows 9000 (default 3600)

Arrows that changed by this mod

Ancient Nord Arrow	
Bloodcursed Elven Arrow
Daedric Arrow	
Dragonbone Arrow 
Dwarven Arrow	
Ebony Arrow	
Elven Arrow	
Falmer Arrow	
Forsworn Arrow	
Glass Arrow	
Iron Arrow	
Nordic Arrow 
Nord Hero Arrow
Orcish Arrow	
Practice Arrow
Riekling Spear (range Default 4000 -> 60000 as other arrows)
Stalhrim Arrow 
Steel Arrow	
Sunhallowed Elven Arrow 

and

Bound Arrow (that you shoot with Bound Bow)

I recommend you to use this mod with this setting in Skyrim.ini

[Combat]
f1PArrowTiltUpAngle=0.15

[Actor]
fVisibleNavmeshMoveDist=30000.0000


Require Dawnguard, Dragonborn


My other mods

No Gravity FAST Bolts
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/34507/
author: CowEye
